We're building a living digital clone for everyone.

About Pickle

Pickle is an early-stage team building a new foundation for human connection in the age of AI. We’re rethinking the digital self, creating interactive AI clones that don’t just speak like you, but learn like you, think like you, and represent who you are. In a world saturated with reach, we’re building for depth, architecting the infrastructure to form real, lasting relationships at scale. Our mission is ambitious: to scale strong ties by scaling the self.

We’re building a persistent AI avatar that speaks in your voice, learns from your behavior, and connects on your behalf whether you’re asleep, focused, or on the other side of the world. Our work spans real-time multimodal modeling, interactive memory systems, and identity architecture. We’re not building tools that generate AI avatars. We’re defining a new interface between humans and machines, where presence is continuous and connection happens with the speed of thought and the scale of software.

We’re a small team of builders who move fast, go deep, and care personally. We work ruthlessly not out of obligation, but because we believe the next computing layer won’t come from a roadmap, but from relentless iteration and full immersion. We value speed, precision, and taste. Our culture isn’t meetings and policies. It’s curiosity, code, and conviction.

If you’re obsessed with hard problems and driven to shape how humanity interacts with machines, we’d love to meet you.

— The Pickle Team

About the role

ABOUT US

Pickle is building the future of human connection, starting with your AI clone.

In a world where reach is abundant but depth is rare, we’re rethinking how people express themselves and form meaningful relationships. Our goal is ambitious: to give everyone a living, human-like digital clone that can think, speak, and feel like you, so you can scale who you are, not just what you do.

We’re a small team of builders, designers, and researchers backed by Y Combinator, NFX, Krew Capital, and BASS Ventures. We move fast, work hard, and care deeply. Our culture is built on intensity, imagination, and long-term craftsmanship. We believe this is the start of a new era—where the digital self becomes an extension of the human self—and we’re here to shape it from first principles.

Our mission is to help people scale strong ties by scaling the self.

ABOUT THE ROLE

Pickle is looking for exceptional AI engineers to help us build the first truly human AI clone—real time, expressive, and persistent across voice, video, and memory. As a founding researcher, you’ll work at the frontier of multimodal learning, diffusion models, NeRFs, and real-time generation. Your work will shape how clones understand context, express emotion, and adapt over time, thus bringing deeply personal, interactive AI to life.

ABOUT THE RESPONSIBILITIES

Research and develop multimodal models that combine voice, video, and text to create deeply human-like AI clones.
Push the frontier on expressiveness and realism using techniques like diffusion models, NeRFs, and 3DGS.
Prototype and fine-tune models for real-time performance, identity preservation, and long-term contextual memory.
Collaborate closely with engineers and designers to bring cutting-edge research into a seamless, user-facing product.
